name: Club Dance Party VR
description: - Exciting dance time for those who are tired of work! Experience the real rhythm through realistic rhythmical VR! New conceptual club dance party within your home!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows7 / 8.1 / 10 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or GTX 1060 or better/ AMD R9 290 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows7 / 8.1 / 10 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 or better/ AMD RX VEGA 56 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
